desc: Illuminate your life with the powers of the Virtues. Virtues are the seeds that we plant in the garden of our hearts. Each soy wax candle is hand-poured with 100% soy wax and non-toxic fragrances-- while being infused with good vibes as Anna dances and sings to bachata, Hawaiian Reggae, and other favorites.

layout.text: Our candles help you align with each virtue
